ygData.subject: Re: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually when they announced the change I didn t notice that huge an improvement at all. Shada says it s better now but then maybe he s just gotten used to the
ygData.messageBody:
Actually when they announced the change I didn't notice that huge an
improvement at all. Shada says it's better now but then maybe he's just
gotten used to the "new" difficulty level. :)

After the announce improvement I remember logging on one day and having
it take 6 trys to start Selo's. Not a happy day.


On Mon, Nov 22/99, Kyle Sibbald <ksibbald@...> wrote:
> From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>
>
> A long time ago didn't they mention in a patch that level 40+ were changed
> to have less of a chance at missing notes or was this just talk?
> 8)
> 8)I was particularly annoyed at this too, and, I think it's the main
> 8)reason we miss so many notes on our 40+ songs. I have a feeling the
> 8)code tests against Level x 5 + 5 for the skill check and doesn't make
> 8)allowances for the skill cap. It seems the logical explanation for why
> 8)our 40+ songs are so hard to start.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
